title: Text of a Letter to the Chairmen of Certain Congressional Committees on the National Cyber Strategy – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
October 22, 2018
Dear Mr. Chairman:In accordance with section 1636 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2019 (Public Law 115‑232), I have enclosed the National Cyber Strategy and classified annex.Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
